system.description: Effect: Last Resort fails if the user has not used every other attack on its Active List at least once this combat. If the user switches out or is @Affliction[fainted] this effect resets. If Last Resort is the only attack on the active attack list, it fails when used.

actions.name: Last Resort
actions.description: Effect: Last Resort fails if the user has not used every other attack on its Active List at least once this combat. If the user switches out or is @Affliction[fainted] this effect resets. If Last Resort is the only attack on the active attack list, it fails when used.
